name: DartsPlus API
description: A simple flask api based on sqlite include unit tests and documentation.

DISABLE_AUTH.description: Set to any non-empty value to disable token authentication.

scripts.postdeploy: bash -c "pip install psycopg2-binary && flask db upgrade && flask fake users 10 && flask fake posts 100"
